verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were of Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Why <S%G1302><s%> do your disciples <S%G3101><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders? <S%G4245><s%> for they wash <S%G3538><s%> not their hands <S%G5495><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they eat <S%G2068><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G1302><s%> do you also <S%G2532><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> by your <S%G5216><s%> tradition? <S%G3862><s%>

For God <S%G2316><s%> commanded, <S%G1781><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and mother: <S%G3384><s%> and, He that curses <S%G2551><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> let him die <S%G5053><s%> the death. <S%G2288><s%>

But you say, <S%G3004><s%> Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> It is a gift, <S%G1435><s%> by whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you might be profited <S%G5623><s%> by me;

And honor <S%G5091><s%> not his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> he shall be free. Thus <S%G2532><s%> have you made <S%G208><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> of none <S%G208><s%> effect <S%G208><s%> by your <S%G5216><s%> tradition. <S%G3862><s%>
You hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> did Esaias <S%G2268><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> of you, saying, <S%G3004><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> draws near <S%G1448><s%> to me with their mouth, <S%G4750><s%> and honors <S%G5091><s%> me with their lips; <S%G5491><s%> but their heart <S%G2588><s%> is far <S%G4206><s%> from me.
But in vain <S%G3155><s%> they do worship <S%G4576><s%> me, teaching <S%G1321><s%> for doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the commandments <S%G1778><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And he called <S%G4341><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Hear, <S%G191><s%> and understand: <S%G4920><s%>

Not that which goes <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> defiles <S%G2840><s%> a man; <S%G444><s%> but that which comes <S%G1607><s%> out of the mouth, <S%G4750><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> defiles <S%G2840><s%> a man. <S%G444><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Know <S%G1492><s%> you that the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were offended, <S%G4624><s%> after they heard <S%G191><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> saying? <S%G3056><s%>

But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> plant, <S%G5451><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> my heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> has not planted, <S%G5452><s%> shall be rooted <S%G1610><s%> up.

Let them alone: <S%G863><s%> they be blind <S%G5185><s%> leaders <S%G3595><s%> of the blind. <S%G5185><s%> And if <S%G1437><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> lead <S%G3594><s%> the blind, <S%G5185><s%> both <S%G297><s%> shall fall <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ditch. <S%G999><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Declare <S%G5419><s%> to us this <S%G5026><s%> parable. <S%G3850><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Are you also <S%G2532><s%> yet <S%G188><s%> without <S%G801><s%> understanding? <S%G801><s%>

Do not you yet <S%G3768><s%> understand, <S%G3539><s%> that whatever <S%G3956><s%> enters <S%G1531><s%> in at <S%G1519><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> goes <S%G5562><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the belly, <S%G2836><s%> and is cast <S%G1544><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the draught? <S%G856><s%>

But those <S%G3588><s%> things which <S%G3588><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> from the heart; <S%G2588><s%> and they defile <S%G2840><s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>

For out of the heart <S%G2588><s%> proceed <S%G1831><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> thoughts, <S%G1261><s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%> adulteries, <S%G3430><s%> fornications, <S%G4202><s%> thefts, <S%G2829><s%> false <S%G5577><s%> witness, <S%G5577><s%> blasphemies: <S%G988><s%>

These <S%G5023><s%> are the things which <S%G3588><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> a man: <S%G444><s%> but to eat <S%G5315><s%> with unwashed <S%G449><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> defiles <S%G2840><s%> not a man. <S%G444><s%>
Then <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> there, <S%G1564><s%> and departed <S%G402><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the coasts <S%G3313><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon. <S%G4605><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> of Canaan <S%G5478><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the same <S%G1565><s%> coasts, <S%G3725><s%> and cried <S%G2905><s%> to him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me, O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> you son <S%G5207><s%> of David; <S%G1138><s%> my daughter <S%G2364><s%> is grievously <S%G2560><s%> vexed <S%G1139><s%> with a devil. <S%G1139><s%>

But he answered <S%G611><s%> her not a word. <S%G3056><s%> And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and sought <S%G2065><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Send <S%G630><s%> her away; <S%G630><s%> for she cries <S%G2896><s%> after <S%G3693><s%> us.
But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> I am not sent <S%G649><s%> but to the lost <S%G622><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> of the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> she and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> help <S%G997><s%> me.

But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> It is not meet <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the children's <S%G5043><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and to cast <S%G906><s%> it to dogs. <S%G2952><s%>

And she said, <S%G2036><s%> Truth, <S%G3483><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%> yet <S%G1063><s%> the dogs <S%G2952><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> of the crumbs <S%G5589><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> from their masters' <S%G2962><s%> table. <S%G5132><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to her, O woman, <S%G1135><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> is your faith: <S%G4102><s%> be it to you even as you will. <S%G2309><s%> And her daughter <S%G2364><s%> was made <S%G2390><s%> whole <S%G2390><s%> from that very <S%G1565><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> departed <S%G3327><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> near <S%G3844><s%> to the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> and went <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and sat <S%G2521><s%> down <S%G2521><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>

And great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, having <S%G2192><s%> with them those that were lame, <S%G5560><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> dumb, <S%G2974><s%> maimed, <S%G2948><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> others, <S%G2087><s%> and cast <S%G4496><s%> them down <S%G4496><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> feet; <S%G4228><s%> and he healed <S%G2323><s%> them:

So that <S%G5620><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> wondered, <S%G2296><s%> when they saw <S%G991><s%> the dumb <S%G2974><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> the maimed <S%G2948><s%> to be whole, <S%G5199><s%> the lame <S%G5560><s%> to walk, <S%G4043><s%> and the blind <S%G5185><s%> to see: <S%G991><s%> and they glorified <S%G1392><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> to him, and said, <S%G2036><s%> I have compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they continue <S%G4357><s%> with me now <S%G2235><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> to eat: <S%G5315><s%> and I will <S%G2309><s%> not send <S%G630><s%> them away <S%G630><s%> fasting, <S%G3523><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> they faint <S%G1590><s%> in the way. <S%G3598><s%>

And his disciples <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to him, From where <S%G4159><s%> should we have so <S%G5118><s%> much <S%G5118><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2047><s%> as to fill <S%G5526><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> great <S%G5118><s%> a multitude? <S%G3793><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, How <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> you? And they said, <S%G2036><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> and a few <S%G3641><s%> little <S%G2485><s%> fishes. <S%G2485><s%>
And he commanded <S%G2753><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to sit <S%G377><s%> down <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground. <S%G1093><s%>

And he took <S%G2983><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and the fishes, <S%G2486><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> and broke <S%G2806><s%> them, and gave <S%G1325><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to the multitude. <S%G3793><s%>

And they did all <S%G3956><s%> eat, <S%G5315><s%> and were filled: <S%G5526><s%> and they took <S%G142><s%> up of the broken <S%G2801><s%> meat that was left <S%G4052><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> full. <S%G4134><s%>
And they that did eat <S%G2068><s%> were four <S%G5070><s%> thousand <S%G5070><s%> men, <S%G435><s%> beside <S%G5565><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> and children. <S%G3813><s%>

And he sent <S%G630><s%> away <S%G630><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and took <S%G1684><s%> <S%G1519><s%> ship, <S%G4143><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the coasts <S%G3725><s%> of Magdala. <S%G3093><s%>
